description.p: Shortwave is an internet radio player that provides access to a station database with over 50,000 stations.
短波是个提供对具有超过 50000 个电台的电台数据库访问的互联网广播播放器。
«Коротка хвиля» — програвач інтернет-радіостанцій, який надає доступ до бази з понад 50000 станцій.
Shortwave, 50.000’i aşkın istasyon barındıran veri tabanına erişmenizi sağlayan internet radyo oynatıcısıdır.
Shortwave är en internetradiospelare som ger tillgång till en stationsdatabas med över 50000 stationer.
Program Kratki valovi je internetni radijski predvajalnik, ki omogoča dostop do podatkovne zbirke več kot 50.000 postaj.
Shortwave - это интернет-радиоплеер, который предоставляет доступ к базе данных станций, насчитывающей более 50 000 станций.
Shortwave é um reprodutor de rádio na Internet que fornece acesso a um banco de dados de estações com mais de 50.000 estações.
Shortwave es un lector de ràdio internet que provesís accès a una basa de donadas d'estacions amb mai de 50 000 estacions.
Shortwave ინტერნეტ-რადიოს დამკვრელია, რომელიც საშუალებას გაძლევთ 50, 000-ზე მეტ სადგურს მოუსმინოთ.
Shortwave è un riproduttore di radio su Internet che fornisce l'accesso a un database con oltre 50.000 stazioni.
Shortwave es un reproductor de radio per internet que forni accesso a un base de datos con plus de 30.000 stationes.
Shortwave הוא נגן רדיו אינטרנט המספק גישה למסד נתונים עם למעלה מ־50,000 תחנות.
Shortwave est un lecteur de radios internet qui permet d’accéder à une base de données de plus de 50 000 stations.
Shortwave on internetradioasemien toistamiseen tarkoitettu sovellus, joka tarjoaa yli 50 000 aseman tietokannan.
موج کوتاه پخش‌کنندهٔ رادیو اینترنتی‌ای است که دسترسی به پایگاه داده‌ای با بیش از ۵۰٫۰۰۰ ایستگاه را فراهم می‌کند.
Shortwave interneteko irrati-estazioen erreproduzigailua da, 50.000 estazio baino gehiago dituen datu-base baterako sarbidea ematen duena.
Shortwave es un reproductor de radio por Internet que proporciona acceso a una base de datos con más de 50.000 emisoras.
Shortwave ist eine Internetradio-Wiedergabe, die Zugang zu einer Senderdatenbank mit über 50.000 Sendern bietet.
Shortwave er en internetradioafspiller, som giver adgang til en database med over 50.000 stationer.
Shortwave е интернет радио плеър с база от данни от над 50 000 станции.
Shortwave — гэта прайгравальнік інтэрнэт-радыё з доступам да базы даных, якая змяшчае больш за 50 000 станцый.

description.p: Shortwave now supports background playback, allowing the playback to continue when you close the window. If desired, the old behaviour can be restored in the preferences.
The recording feature has also been completely overhauled. You can now choose from three different modes:

ul.li: Save All Tracks: Automatically save all recorded tracks
Decide for Each Track: Temporarily record tracks and save only the ones you want
Record Nothing: Stations are played without recording
Directory in which recorded tracks are saved can be changed
Minimum and maximum duration of recorded tracks can be configured
Tracks can already be marked to be saved during recording
Ongoing recordings can be cancelled
Improved desktop notifications, with the direct option to mark tracks to be saved
New dialog window for tracks with detailed information
Volume can now be changed via keyboard shortcuts
Fixed an issue which prevented station covers from loading in certain desktop environments
New MPRIS media controls implementation with improved CPU usage
Song notifications are disabled by default now
Refreshed user interface by making use of new Libadwaita widgets
Large parts of the app were reworked, providing a solid foundation for the next upcoming features
Last station now gets restored on app launch
Redesigned player sidebar, allowing to control volume more easily
New recording indicator showing whether the current playback is being recorded
Fixed buffering issue which prevented playing new stations, especially after switching stations too fast
Fixed issues which sometimes prevented that a song gets recorded
Fixed issue that volume remains muted after unmuting
No more loading on startup, stations now get directly retrieved from cached data
Fixed issue which sometimes prevented loading more than 8 stations from library
More supported image file format for station covers
Enhanced security by loading station covers using sandboxed Glycin image library
Non square covers automatically get a blurred background
New generated fallback for stations without any cover image
Improved disk usage by automatically purging no longer needed cached data
More useful station suggestions by respecting configured system language / region
Suggestions now get updated with every start, no longer always showing the same stations
More accessible search feature, no longer hidden in a subpage
Search results are no longer limited at 250 stations
Faster and more efficient search by using new grid widgets
Shortwave is now a registered Google Cast app, no longer relying on the generic media player
New backend which greatly improves communication stability with cast devices
Improved discovery of cast devices with lower CPU and memory usage
Now possible to change the volume of a connected cast device

description.p: Version 3.0.0 is a stable release, with the following major improvements since 2.0.1:

ul.li: Updated user interface that uses the new Adwaita design, with many improvements.
Support for the new GNOME 42 dark mode.
New option to add private stations to the library, which should not (or cannot) be available on radio-browser.info (e.g. local network or paid streams).
Display station bitrate information, which can also be used as a sorting option.
Save station data to disk so that it is still available when a station gets removed from the online database.
New button on the search page that allows to sort the search results.
Overhauled station dialog, with more clearly displayed information.
Update desktop notification on song change instead of generating a new separate notification for each song.
Shortwave can now be used normally, even if radio-browser.info is offline / unavailable.

description.p: Besides these improvements, this version also includes many changes under the hood changes, so many crashes and other bugs have been fixed. It also contains updated translations for 31 different languages.
This version contains minor improvements and bug fixes.

ul.li: Improve buffering to avoid audio issues for streams with a high bitrate.
Fix issue that no connection could be established when a VPN connection was active.
Automatically select search entry when the search view gets activated.

description.p: Version 2.0.0 is a stable release, with the following major improvements since 1.1.0:

ul.li: Get notified about new songs via desktop notifications.
New mini player window mode. Control important features with a super compact window widget.
Redesigned station information dialog window. Added ability to copy the stream url.
Improved keyboard navigation of the user interface.
Inhibit sleep/hibernate mode during audio playback.

description.p: Besides these improvements, this version contains many under the hood changes. The complete user interface has been updated from GTK3 to GTK4. Many app components have been modernised or completely rewritten. As a result, many crashes or other bugs have been fixed.
This version also contains updated translations for 27 different languages.
This version fixes a bug that caused some users not to be able to record songs.
This release also updates translations in several languages.
This might be the last release with the feature to import Gradio databases. The needed API server will be deactivated / no longer available in August 2020.
Version 1.1.0 is a stable release, with the following major improvements since 1.0.1:

ul.li: Add CTRL + spacebar as shortcut to start/stop audio playback.
Add stream buffering to prevent playback stuttering.
Add featured carousel to discover page.
Add support for non pulseaudio systems / environments.
Add support for additional mouse buttons to switch between views.
Improve stability of audio/recording backend.
Fixed issue that the volume didn't get calculated correctly (linear/cubic).
Fixed issue that broken stations are getting displayed in search results.
Fixed issue with random scrolling in search page.
Fixed issues which prevented to import Gradio databases.
